lead_paragraph: Mack Horton called Chinese swimmer Sun Yang a drug cheat, and then went out and dethroned the defending Olympic champion in the 400-meter freestyle.

headline.print_headline: Horton Wins Gold After Calling Out Sun Yang as Drug Cheat
headline.main: Horton Wins Gold After Calling Out Sun Yang as Drug Cheat

snippet: Mack Horton called Chinese swimmer Sun Yang a drug cheat, and then went out and dethroned the defending Olympic champion in the 400-meter freestyle....
